name: channel_decrease
description: This function is used to decrease the channel of a TV device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device for which channel needs to be decreased is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the air conditioner is located. e.g. living room, bedroom, bathroom, etc.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device on which the channel needs to be decreased.

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: The amount by which the channel needs to be decreased for the device.
